    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public Result execute(long userId,
                      java.lang.String message)

        Execute method that is in charge of calling the UserUserWrapper.ban method five then userId.

        If this method returns an class AccessReport, this means the user accessing the endpoint did not pass authentication.

        Otherwise the class Ban command was executed, and the controller should respond based on whether or not the command was a success or not

        See Also:
        UserUserWrapper.ban, class AccessReport, class Ban
